tool_description: Analyzes and scores completed reference responses to assess applicant suitability, reliability, and fit for volunteer roles.

evaluation_criteria.description: Criteria for evaluating references (reliability, communication, teamwork, etc.)

error_messages: Invalid outreach ID: Provide a valid reference outreach identifier
No reference responses: At least one completed reference response required
Empty evaluation criteria: Provide criteria for assessing reference feedback
usage: Submit completed reference responses with evaluation criteria to receive scored assessment of applicant suitability based on reference feedback.

response_count.description: Number of references that provided feedback

concerns_raised.description: Any concerns or issues mentioned by references

recommendation_strength.description: Strength of reference recommendations (strong, moderate, weak)
